person.persName: John R. Grace (Trigg County, Kentucky, clerk, attorney, and county judge)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, county judge and attorney. Trigg County, Kentucky, native. Son of William D. Grace and Mary Organ Grace. Married to Susan Emeline Terry Grace in 1859. Father of Mary Grace. Graduate of Transylvania College in Lexington, Kentucky, in 1855. Clerk in Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned eleven enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1850. County judge in Trigg County from 1858 to 1860. Household owned fourteen enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1860. Partners with Matthew Mayes in Mayes & Grace law firm from 1860 to 1865.
